thread.section_title: Lucky Tackle Box Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Lucky Tackle Box | www.luckytacklebox.com
thread.title: Chris Dutton
thread.title_full: Lucky Tackle Box reviewed by Chris Dutton

author: Chris Dutton
title: Chris Dutton
text: I am a new subscriber to LTB and I forgot to add the code for a free live target lure as well as I couldn't upgrade my box subscription online so I sent in an email request for help. The very next day I recieved help from NICHOLE Who went above and beyond to fix my concerns. I have to say she was super fast in response and fixed my problems even better than I could have expected. I highly recommend LTB to all my friends and family because NICHOLE has exceeded my expectations for customer service satisfaction. Thanks again nichole!!
